It's official: @GeorgeGascon is the new District Attorney of Los Angeles. ⁣I look forward to seeing him continue the fight for the well-being of all our communities while demanding accountability and major reform from a misfocused and broken justice system. Congratulations!
America voted for hope over fear science over fiction and fairness over privilege. I’m deeply proud to call @JoeBiden my next President and @KamalaHarris my next Vice President!
